item.title: Weekly update (May 04 ~ May 10, 2020)
item.description: Last week, we landed 63 PRs in the TiDB repository, 2 PRs in the TiUP repository, 18 PRs in the TiDB Dashboard repository, 7 PRs in the TiSpark repository, and 16 PRs in the TiKV and PD repositories.
